name: Beakion Star(AGDG DEMO D4Y)(WIP)
description:
Short and intense action platformer where you have to collect stars by the help of dash reset and screenwarp. (WIP) (Controller highly recommended).

Controls:

-Arrow keys to move / joystick for controller

-Z to jump / A for controller

-X + arrow direction while in the air to dash / X + joystick direction while in the air for controller

-If you dash at a enemy he will explode and you will be allow to dash again
